website_summaries.verdict: A premium putter that can help you take your golf skills to new heights.
pros: Perfect weight for a smooth stroke
Available in multiple grip options for added convenience
Sold with a handy head cover
Constructed from high-end materials, guaranteeing the putter will continue to serve you well for an extended period of time
cons: The putter's head may be too light for some golfers
Putter is shorter than many comparable options

customer_reviews.title: Great Putts
customer_reviews.text: We give this one away every year and people love it. It hits straight and makes the green easy to read by not being so bulky. Plus it’s a freaking putter, so practice your game and grab your nuts before you swing and you should be fine, spending $400 on a putter to get your head out of your a$$ so you have confidence in your swing should be a crime!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It's a magic putter.
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know where to begin, this putter is a magic putter, I'd tried a few odyssey models from friends on the course and it felt nice. Now that I have it in my bag, my putting has dramatically improved. The feel of the putter provides quite a bit of feedback so it is very easy to fine tune your putting.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Putter
customer_reviews.text: After of few rounds of golf, find this a very well balanced putter, with a soft touch, and great accuracy. Didn't like the grip(thought it was too small), and had it replaced with a larger grip...improved feel, and handling.
customer_reviews.author: TRMartin

customer_reviews.title: Love the Grip!
customer_reviews.text: For me, I am having a tough time changing putters....I heard great things about Odyssey putters, and I like the feel, so I am going to give it time....I won't lie and say it cut 5-10 strokes off my game. Eventually, I think it may. I already feel more confident in my putting, but it will take time. It feels well balanced, has nice markings, and again, I really like the grip. I also ordered an inch shorter putter, which feels better. It came with a nice cover too. Quick delivery and well packaged. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: indianscoach

customer_reviews.title: It puts the put in putter.
customer_reviews.text: Holy putter! I have made More putts with this putter than I did without it! But then I like a good heavy putter with that smooth pendulum like swing that flows straight through as long as you putt with your shoulder and keep your arms straight! Head down and keep aligned! Score! Ahhh yes. It puts the ball in the hole. I wish I could throw the ping pong ball with this putter in Beer Pong!
customer_reviews.author: BillTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great putter. Now if I could only read a
customer_reviews.text: Great putter. Now if I could only read a green
customer_reviews.author: donald lenzi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome putter. The putter does it's job by hitting a straight shot...BUT YOU have to hit it where it needs to go. Don't forget the person putting makes more a difference than the putter. But this putter will do EXACTLY what it is designed to do. It hits a clean putt so long as you can use it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Putter is awesome, just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Putter is awesome, just as advertised. I won't pretend like it changed my golf game and now I'm Jordan Speith but, my putting has improved significantly. The putter has a good weight to it, feels comfortable, and it has a very solid contact point. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Arod Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love this putter!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the finest putter I have ever owned. You can tell as soon as you pick it up the wonderful balance it has. The feel of the ball contacting the head is so soft. Has improved my putting for sure!
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: excellent form and function
customer_reviews.text: excellent putter, alignment lines are natural for they eye, the face sits square and feels balanced with perfect (for me) putter head weight. easy to keep the putter on line and it provides good feel on ball contact. form and function just work with this putter. would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ruggermel

customer_reviews.title: Putting in Style
customer_reviews.text: I like my new putter. I was glad it came with a putter cover. The grip was different than the one pictured, but I actually like the one I got better. Looking forward to getting out and using it once the weather turns warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' in Rockford

customer_reviews.title: Solid putter
customer_reviews.text: Great putter! It feels very solid and I love the jumbo grip and the shorter length cuz it allows me to get right over the ball. It’s also very nice to look at!
customer_reviews.author: Dentite

customer_reviews.title: Great putter, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling putter. Even though I wish the back was rounded more I like the long line down the center to help line up putts. The grip was standard size, not the super stroke ones that come on newer models so I replaced it with the square SS putter grip.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I love touch this putter gives
customer_reviews.text: I can seriously putt way better with this putter. I used to have putting nightmares! I got the bigger grip and love it. I couldn’t be more pleased. Two big thumbs up for Odyssee!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The putter you go back to after your $300 putter gets stale.
customer_reviews.text: Good putter that squares up to your intended line well. No real negatives. This putter has been out for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cool putter
customer_reviews.text: good price and nice putter the face is made of same material as golf balls ball pops off the putter
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Decent putter
customer_reviews.text: Decent putter. Love the bigger grip I got on it. Many, many more better options available out there.
customer_reviews.author: michael williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Putter!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husbands birthday. He loves itM he says he cant believe it didnt cost 300 dollars!
customer_reviews.author: nicoley25

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!! 5’5” ordered 33”, perfect length, weight, balance, and looks really really good. Ordered used, looks brand new with new matching head cover. The confidence alone I get from this putter is worth every penny to me.
customer_reviews.author: Skin in Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Great "blade" putter
customer_reviews.text: Classic style putter with Odyssey quality. There is a lot of feel with the face of the putter.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was in great condition. Like new as described. I got it for a great price. It's a really nice putter. Used it twice and I'm already getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this putter for my wife. She's likes the look and feel of it over the old putter sure had had for over a decade. She's still getting used to the feel so putting had not improved yet 😁 but once she adjusts to it,. Look out!
customer_reviews.author: Buck51

customer_reviews.title: Excellent putter/fair price
customer_reviews.text: I actually luv this putter. I'm now hitting on the line I'm aiming at and I really like the feel. My putting has definitely improved.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Good feedback from putter.  Grip similar to superstroke.
customer_reviews.text: Great putter, nice weight. Got the 33 so my arms hang low and I can use my shoulders to putt. Simple design, back to original mallet style.
customer_reviews.author: lawdawg

customer_reviews.title: Odyssey continues to be my putter of choice
customer_reviews.text: My old Odyssey was coming apart at the grip and the face insert was worn out, so time for a new one. The "Hot" face insert is great. The ball pops off the face nicely. The weighting is good and the alignment marks at the back help get the ball off on the right line.
customer_reviews.author: LakeView

customer_reviews.title: Nice Odyssey but I like my two ball Odyssey better ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice Odyssey but I like my two ball Odyssey better for picking the line of the putt. Still, it has excellent balance and with some practice it is very good at judging distance.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know why I waited so long to upgrade my putter.. Feels great and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this putter
customer_reviews.text: Love this putter. Have the 2ball and always liked it but felt time to evolve and really get a great feel with this club. I don't tend to get the heel drag that I occasionally ran into with the 2ball
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R

customer_reviews.title: Nice Putter
customer_reviews.text: This putter has great weight and with much less effort than previous putter gets the ball to the target. Still have to work on the extra distance I get from the same stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter
customer_reviews.text: Great Putter ! With this putter I hole every put on the first try !!! ~Joking about that, but it has greatly improved my putting. Quality and well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Don Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right length.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter, 13 yrs old, she loves it. Perfect length and weight for her.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkee

customer_reviews.title: Gopher 4
customer_reviews.text: Great putter. The grip was off-center just a bit and had to be re-gripped bother than that great service.
customer_reviews.author: Golf-4-life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best balance and touch for a senior's hands that need the putter to carry the right amount of momentum.
customer_reviews.author: elliott

customer_reviews.title: Putter Extraordinaire
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my Husband for his Birthday. He has wanted this putter for two years. He absolutely loves it!!! Best Wife Ever
customer_reviews.author: Luvee

customer_reviews.title: Good putter...Wrong grip!
customer_reviews.text: Good putter, but didn't come with jumbo grip as in description.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: The person that won absolutely loved the club
customer_reviews.text: I bought this club as a prize in our golf tournament for our longest drive. The person that won absolutely loved the club,
customer_reviews.author: Mar G

customer_reviews.title: Great putter at the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's by far the best putter i have had in my bag. I have used an Odyssey 2Ball for quite some time but love the way comes off the putter face. Almost A perfect roll every time. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still getting used to it, but feels great.
customer_reviews.text: Only have about 2 rounds with it, but it feels great! Great amount of power, so u need very little effort for longer putts. still getting used to hitting it more accurately, but that's on me, not the putter.
customer_reviews.author: Kody Schenker

customer_reviews.title: I've only used it twice so far its weight is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it twice so far its weight is just right and feel is solid. It's everything i thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received the item promptly, exactly as described. Works well. I would buy from them again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: DensDeal

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes this putter!
customer_reviews.text: Husband says he likes this golf club. He's putting better so that's a positive!
customer_reviews.author: Joanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took 20 strokes off my game - this was for 20 rounds. Hopefully the additional alignment aids will help.
customer_reviews.author: D. P.

customer_reviews.title: No more 3 putts
customer_reviews.text: The best putter of my life, no more 3 putts !
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre

customer_reviews.title: So far I like the potter
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the potter, but I haven't used it enough to be sure. Balls bounce quickly off the face if it is a clean hit.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter
customer_reviews.text: I love this putter. Great feel and swing momentum. I used to 2 and 3 put. Now I 1 and 2 put.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Putters are so much personal choice, happy with this one
customer_reviews.author: Scott in Newton

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've had great success with this odyssey putter right from the get go. I'm not a great golfer by any means but I've seen great improvement and consistency in my putting.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Repine

customer_reviews.title: Putter is just fine thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Plan is to putt better. And to find out in the near future if it's the "putter" or the "puttie".
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've loved this putter since the model first debuted about two decades ago. I love this version of it.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Putter
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: Great putter with great weight to it. Showed up to the house on a Friday playing with on Saturday with zero practice with it. Before I hit the course I threw on a super stroke grip and couldn't be happier. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Van Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I returned this one for Rossie version with more alignment aids.
customer_reviews.author: D. P.

customer_reviews.title: Thee one
customer_reviews.text: This is my baby right here. I love this putter and it really gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft on the ball and easy to hit.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect putter, for a great price! Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: great putter at an even better price, what more do u want.
customer_reviews.author: SmashedDragon

customer_reviews.title: Love the weight and feel
customer_reviews.text: Love the weight and feel, and I definitely saw an improvement in my first outing. It's not a miracle worker, but close enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I ordered. The putter itself is great. The white hot face gives consistent contact allowing for great distance control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great feel at contact, just a little heavy when holding. short putts take getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great putter for its price. Received timely and very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: TGL

customer_reviews.title: It has a good look and feel which gives you the added confidence ...
customer_reviews.text: The Odyssey Hot Pro 2.0 #1 putter is everything that I expected it to be. It has a good look and feel which gives you the added confidence you need for your putting game!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Sinking more putts!
customer_reviews.text: Love the jumbo grip and the soft balanced feel! My putting has greatly improved with this club.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Love this putter
customer_reviews.text: Love this putter! Weight is perfect. Take the opportunity to go to a sporting goods store and get the length that suits you best. Glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great feel. Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Great feel. Love the product. Just had a round of 5 one putts. Feels good to have confidence above the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful Putter!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Putter! No-nonsense perfect balance head with a great grip! A solid feel with the perfect weight.
customer_reviews.author: n. dayle ervin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner and this is a very nice putter , feels great
customer_reviews.author: Yvette M. Schieffer

customer_reviews.title: and like it. I think my putting has improved with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used the putter for about 6 weeks, now, and like it. I think my putting has improved with it. I would like to put an oversized grip on it, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even Better
customer_reviews.text: It replaced a similar but old Odyssey. I like it even better. Improved balance and feel, actually putting better!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Manlove

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter! the huge guide line really helps
customer_reviews.text: Great Putter! the huge guide line really helps, I have been playing with it for a few weeks and feel like I have been a lot better at the shorter putts.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cusano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received the putter really fast and it had a cover which I wasn’t expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Clay elerson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I feel like my usual cheap squeegee mop does a better job. There is no way to scrub hard marks left on the floor. One spin to ring water out seemed like it did not keep the mop wet enough to go over much floor space. I finally ended up just dunking the mop in the water and going from bucket to floor and would spin it out when i noticed the white end of the mop getting discolored. Just not worth the money at all in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: JordanTop Contributor: Anime

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The putter is well balanced and the grip is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin L. Duffer

customer_reviews.title: Swift delivery and best match. 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Swift delivery and best match. 100% satisfied. In KSA it is difficult to buy golf relevant items. Please add more club to deliver to KSA
customer_reviews.author: hoyoon lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter
customer_reviews.text: Great putter, easy to handle and manipulate and for the price there is no better. I have the 34' and I have been one or two putting every time. Very happy with the purchase. Sweet head cover as well!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Frasciello

customer_reviews.title: It's an Odyssey
customer_reviews.text: Great putter.. had to change the grip to a SuperStroke Slim 3.0 to make it a 5 star putter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great roll off the face off this club
customer_reviews.text: Great roll off the face off this club. Love the weight of the head. The alignment lines definitely help. Would recommend this putter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the control it gives from the club face...rolls true
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice putter did not know Amazon had golf clubs at a very good price. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Over all good
customer_reviews.text: The grip is installed slightly off center. Everything else is up to par with odyssey standards. Over all good club
customer_reviews.author: E.Snead

customer_reviews.title: Odyssey always does a great job! This putter performs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Product is precisely as described online! Odyssey always does a great job! This putter performs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I have recceived something good.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a moment. but I have recceived something good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit and function are amazing. Ordered the 33" size and it fits my ...
customer_reviews.text: My first new putter in 30 years, and it was well worth the wait! Form, fit and function are amazing. Ordered the 33" size and it fits my small frame to a tee! Price and free shipping were an extra nice bonus. Would buy this club again.
customer_reviews.author: Gunslinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this putter. Feels great when I putt and is very forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect. Great weight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his birthday. It's perfect. Great weight, nice model.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Weer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great putter and gives you great control on the greens!
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great putter. I had a mallet style putter for the past few years, but I decided to go back to a blade. You can't beat the quality for the price here!
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... inch but got a 33 inch putter but am happy with the one I got
customer_reviews.text: asked for a 34 inch but got a 33 inch putter but am happy with the one I got. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD J REAGAN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great putter with amazing feel! Only paid $99 which included the shipping cost and it came very quick for standard shipping. I love that I was able to order the 33 inch length since I am 5'7 and am a little bent when I put. I've personally shaved 4-5 putts off each round already. Came with the head cover too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great putter and great service my first time out with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great putter and great service my first time out with this putter i got two birdies how about that
customer_reviews.author: FRANKLIN  D. DYCUS

customer_reviews.title: but the build is Olof and quality feels as good as the 10 year odyssey it's replacing
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this out in the course yet, but the build is Olof and quality feels as good as the 10 year odyssey it's replacing. Shipping was on time and the product is as expected, a nice club!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband and he LOVES it! He says it has really improved his game.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Solid putting machine
customer_reviews.text: Solid, potent, heavier than I'm using to, but I will enjoy learning to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel for a putter
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall feel of the putter and the look is classic. I just wish it came with an oversize grip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Club
customer_reviews.text: Nice putter, but like all golf clubs it is not a miracle fix to improve your game.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great putter. Easy to line up putts with the lines on the head.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Running

customer_reviews.title: Nice Club
customer_reviews.text: Putter arrived in good shape. Like the way it feels.
customer_reviews.author: Bronconut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this so I had a decent looking putter in the office. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Altrichter

customer_reviews.title: 4 rounds in and it feels great. To early to tell about the scoring
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged well and on time. 4 rounds in and it feels great. To early to tell about the scoring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent club for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Haven't had enough time to perfect it but I think it will work out great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great putter!!! I love it! Well balanced and pleasant to look at!
customer_reviews.author: peggy nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Website ad is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is an excellent putter for the price but though I ordered the left-handed version, I received the right-handed model so I cannot test it's excellence or lack of. Website needs to be corrected as there does not appear to be any way to actually order the lefty model.
customer_reviews.author: wblobsta

product_meta.title: Odyssey Hot Pro 2.0 Putter (White)
feature_bullets: Odyssey White Hot Pro 2.0 with the White Hot Insert is the #1 insert on tour
Proven Head Shape Performance for Every Player: The White Hot Pro line includes a handful of major winning, Tour proven head shapes like the #1, #9, Vline, and Rossie
Aftermarket Odyssey Jumbo Grip by WINN
